title: How to sell an Amazon Kindle book quickly without advertising - Quora

response.answer_text: Fortune favours the brave. If you believe in the miracle then praying for a miracle to occur with you can still do this. My experience says, it is not impossible but it is very tough. Some tips that might work Share your book link on messengers like WhatsApp, hike, howzit etcUse most of the social networks and it's addons for free advertising.Use quora for answering and suggesting your book to your followers.Use different book forums.Write blogs.
